nodes.bodyText:
This helper is used by 5 rules:

S3546: CustomUnclosedResourcesCheck
S3516: InvariantReturnCheck
S2222: LocksNotUnlockedCheck
S2095: UnclosedResourcesCheck
S2755: XxeProcessingCheck

For me, when an exception is unknown, it's either:

we failed to correctly resolve the semantic
it's an exception added by the engine to model the fact that something could go wrong in certain situations.

In both cases, it makes sense to not report an issue to avoid FPs.
